content.query:
-- Create a master key (only needed once)
CREATE MASTER KEY;
GO

-- Create a credential using a SAS token (adjust the SAS token accordingly)
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL MyBlobCredential
WITH
    IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
    SECRET = 'sv=2020-08-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2026-01-01T00:00:00Z&st=2025-01-01T00:00:00Z&spr=https';
GO
